name: Murder At The Wareham's Manor
description:
A small Murder mystery game that was made for the campfire game jam!

Discover who killed Mr.Wareham in this in this Point and click game, Includes 4 different characthers with uniqe dialouges.

Collect Items and interview suspects, to Discover hidden lore and motives.

Music: The dance of the suger plum fairy - tchaikovsky
